Question
========

Of 9 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 9 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 29 and the standard deviation is 24. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.91
* 3.38
* 3.62
* 4.1

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.91: Incorrect
* 3.38: Incorrect
* 3.62: Correct
* 4.1: Incorrect
